traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sleepless Reveler
entries: Magic can't put the satyr to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The satyr makes three ram attacks or three shortbow attacks.

actions.name: Ram
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
entries: Ranged atk +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hail of Arrows (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The satyr fires an arrow that magically transforms into a flurry of missiles in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6 damage) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
